reviewText: Bought this for my daughters bday. Came in good condition. Didn't even have the chance to hide it and my daughter already found it. She is almost 5 and she loves these series. I do too cause they are clean, teach good morals, and aren't dumb like NickJr and all that cable garbage.
bought if for my brother in india... they love it...good product if they love the bears...good to have 1..will recommend..
I am so happy that these classics are still available because they are great for teaching kids good values without them even knowing it. My Grandkids are 2 and 4 and will not move while they are on.
Love that they made this series into videos. Brings back memories and now I buy them all for my little girl and will continue so she can someday pass them on to her kids!
All the Bear dvd's have been a hit in my book. I highly recommend all of them.
My 2 1/2 year old likes this DVD. Keeps him entertained.
